name: Clodsire
flavorText: When attacked, this Pokémon will retaliate by sticking thick spines out from its body. It’s a risky move that puts everything on the line.

previous.name: Annihilape
previous.flavorText: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this Pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.

next.name: Farigiraf
next.flavorText: Now that the brain waves from the head and tail are synced up, the psychic power of this Pokémon is 10 times stronger than Girafarig’s.

pokemon.name: Wooper
pokemon.flavorText:
This POKéMON lives
in cold water. It
will leave the water to search
for food when it
gets cold outside.

pokemon.name: Quagsire
pokemon.flavorText:
This carefree
POKéMON has an
easy-going nature. While swimming, it
always bumps into
boat hulls.
